sen.j: 預（あずかり）とは、平安時代の官司・寺社・荘園などに置かれた職名。
sen.e: Azukari was a post which was set up at government offices, temples/shrines and shoen (manor) in the Heian period.

sen.j: 10世紀に入ると、後院や院庁、御厨子所、進物所、穀倉院をはじめ、国衙や郡衙などを含めて様々な官司において預が設置されていた。
sen.e: In the 10th century, Azukari was set up at various government offices including, without limitation, Goin (retired emperor's palace), In no cho (retired emperor's office), Shinmotsudokoro (serving office), Kokusoin (office of storehouses), Kokuga (provincial government office) and Gunga (country government office).
